alert.note: Alert for Brown (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 8:54PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Brown County through 945 PM CDT... At 853 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southwest of Ainsworth, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ainsworth, Long Pine, Hofeld Lake and Jones Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 near mile marker 194. Highway 20 between mile markers 245 and 251. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for north central Nebraska.
